abstract: The changing economics of print publishing in an increasingly digital world have forced many magazines to rethink their business models.
snippet: The changing economics of print publishing in an increasingly digital world have forced many magazines to rethink their business models.
lead_paragraph: Macworld, a monthly technology magazine devoted to Apple products, laid much of its staff off on Wednesday and will stop publishing a print edition.

headline.main: Macworld to End Its Print Edition and Lay Off Many of Its Employees
headline.print_headline: Macworld to End Its Print Edition and Lay Off Many of Its Employees
